DOC.brief_summary: The Primary Phase I objectives determine recommend phase II dose capecitabine aflibercept doublet combination ; describe dose limit non-dose limiting toxicity . The Phase II Primary objective determine progression free survival associate regimen . The Phase II secondary objective determine response rate associate regimen ; determine overall survival associate regimen ; explore correlation clinical outcome baseline treatment change blood-based angiogenesis biomarkers . This open-label , non-randomized phase I/II trial design assess safety , tolerability RPTD capecitabine plus aflibercept adult subject metastatic colorectal cancer .
